meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Todd DeFilippi Shawn Friend Alison Maguire-Powell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7482.

td.p: Todd DeFilippi, a software engineer from Mountain View, California
Shawn Friend, a law library resource center director from Phoenix, Arizona
Alison Maguire-Powell, a middle school band director from Denton, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,200)

tr.td: BECKY WITH THE GOOD HAIR
AMUSEMENT & THEME PARKS
WAY BACK IN 2015
(Alex: Each correct response begins with the name of a chemical element...)
ELEMENTAL WORDS
IN THE UNIVERSAL DECLARATION OF HUMAN RIGHTS
BOX OFFICE CHAMPS OF THE DECADE
